actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the deduction for expenses paid by an employer for a group health plan if the plan discriminates against adopted children.
short_title: Adopted Children Health Insurance Fairness Act of 1990

summary.text: Adopted Children Health Insurance Fairness Act of 1990 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny the deduction for expenses paid by an employer for a group health plan if the plan discriminates against adopted children.

titles.title: Adopted Children Health Insurance Fairness Act of 1990
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the deduction for expenses paid by an employer for a group health plan if the plan discriminates against adopted children.
